import React from 'react' import { Form,FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button } from 'reactstrap' import '../Booking/booking.css' function Booking({tour,avgRating}) { const {price,reviews}=tour return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating===0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* booking form */}
Information
) } export default Booking
